post_content:
I am looking for an SGC graded Ty Cobb Green Portrait.

Authentic graded to probably a 2.5 is in my price range.

Sweet Cap or Piedmont back is preferred, mainly to keep overall cost down and the project I'm working on, the back will not be shown.

I am open to trading or buying at this point in my search.

Main trade bait would be more modern sports, but I do have a PSA 2 Nap Lajoie Portrait to put towards the overall cost of the Cobb.

Thanks in advance for any help and/or leads!!!

~Joe

Just wanted to drop a quick note and give positive feedback to member
@FRANKRIZZO29.

We worked on a trade last week and I was able to obtain a Green Portrait Cobb from him.

Negotiations were very easy and communication through the whole process was great.
He let me know when he received his card and funds, he let me know when he sent my card and included tracking.  Packaging was A+ as well.

Thanks Frank!!!

Joe, 

Likewise, you were great every step of the way and it was great trading with you.   Enjoy the green cobb and I can't wait to see your display!  Frank
